body: I've been hoping for a new chapter. I really don't want the series to end on this note... I don't like NTR, but I hate it even more when it ends on a sour note, without revenge or resolution of either main character (but in this case, Mighty Wife's husband isn't an important main character). Mighty Wife is just so hot, she deserves a better ending, alongside with more rapings.
I was fine with this being a comedy NTR. But the ending just felt sad...
So sad. no news/doujins about Mighty wife anymore
someone literally redrew so much just so she could have a different shirt lmaolamoamlamomao.
